title: In praise of retirement
creator_credit: Harley Jones and Newport College of Art & Design (Film School)
brief_description: The film gives a portrait of one retired man who has succeeded in keeping active and aware of outside interests. His story is presented along-side an explanation of pre-retirement courses for men in industry, organised by the Newport and Monmouthshire Retirement Council.
